promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a dynamic rare spider dark-type pokemon with galaxy-pattern wings. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or spider. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Cryptogalaxia, a a dynamic rare spider dark-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: Pitch-Black Spear. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "spider", "dark" or "Cryptogalaxia". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, spider-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, dreamy background
generatedDescription: This nocturnal nebula arachnid lurks within tomb-like terrains, unleashing its Pitch-Black Spear under the obsidian night.
